wikipedia_page.main: Phillip Charles George "Phill" Jones (born 25 January 1974) is a New Zealand former professional basketball player who is best known for his time spent with the Nelson Giants in the New Zealand National Basketball League (NZNBL). The two-time Olympian has scored more points in the New Zealand NBL than any other Kiwi player and is second overall in league scoring history. In 2004, he ranked second among all points scorers at the Athens Olympics. In 2016, he became the first player in New Zealand NBL history to reach 400 games.

response: *Phill Jones – basketball player, grew up in Reefton
